name: Where is Santa?
description: “Where is Santa” is a simple 2D survival simulator in which your main task is to collect items and pass a variety of obstacles. In this game you go through a variety of levels, playing for the reindeer, who lost Santa Claus.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8 Processor: 1.2 Ghz + Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 500MB DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard\Mouse
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1GB DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 600 MB available space
